submission:
class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(
        self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]
    ) -> List[int]:
        vis = [0] * n
        now = n - 1

        ans = []
        for u, v in queries:
            if v - u == 1 or vis[u]:
                ans.append(now)
                continue

            i = u + 1
            while i < v:
                if vis[i] == 0:
                    vis[i] = v
                    now -= 1
                    i += 1
                else:
                    # print("aaa", vis[i],i, v, vis)
                    temp = vis[i]
                    vis[i] = v
                    i = temp
                    # i, vis[i] = vis[i], v
                    # print("bbbb", vis[i],i, v, vis)

            # print(111, vis)
            ans.append(now)

        return ans
